title: how do I get "level 7" so I can post on recruitment boards?
body: what does it mean "level 7".  When I am on the recruitment boards, I cannot post ("Create a Discussion"), because when I hover over the button, it says I'm not "Level 7". What does this mean and how do I achieve that?

replies.body: It can take a moment for your account to sync to the boards, and Wuks made a [sync tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/6JI91pva-boards-profile-syncing-tool)to help with that as well.  Everything looks to be in sync now, though!
Posting for the first time will update your level in the forums to your account level in the game at the time you posted. You're showing up as level 30 on the forums now.
